fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack someone each night.
- Fire a missile at someone, dealing a Rampage Powerful attack. (2 Uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You must spend N1 taking off and cannot kill. At the start of D2, the entire town will be notified who you are. If you are roleblocked, the entire process is delayed by one night.
- After you take off, you cannot be targeted. You also cannot vote, be voted, whisper, or be whispered. You can still talk in day chats because it'd be boring otherwise.
- All Protective abilities will supply Anti-Air to their target. All roles with killing abilities gain a two-use Anti Air gun at their own house that can be used in conjunction with their normal ability. If you visit someone who has an active Anti-Air gun twice, you will die.
- You **do** visit your target, and can die as a result.
- You cannot receive the Necronomicon.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven AND react to at least 30 messages with :helicopter:.
